name: IITian Beti Yojana (SEEP - BS Degree Scholarship)
description: 100% scholarship, mentorship, and full academic support for girls pursuing IIT BS Degree without JEE, under SEEP program. Open to all streams (Science, Commerce, Humanities).

name: Mukhyamantri Kanya Vivah Yojana
description: ₹5,000 given at the time of marriage of a girl child to prevent child marriage and promote education.

name: Chief Minister Nari Shakti Yojana
description: Empowers women socially, culturally, and economically via Women's Information and Resource Center.

name: Lakshmi Bai Samajik Suraksha Pension Yojana
description: Financial support to old women living below poverty line in Bihar.

name: Alpsankhyak Muslim Parityaqta/Talaqshuda Mahila Sahayata Yojana
description: Financial aid to divorced/abandoned Muslim women from minority communities.

name: Mukhyamantri Mahila Udyami Yojana
description: Entrepreneurship promotion among women and transgender individuals by giving up to ₹10 lakh assistance.

name: Janani Bal Suraksha Yojana
description: Improves maternal and child health by promoting institutional deliveries and providing support through ASHA/Mamta workers.

name: Mukhyamantri Kanya Suraksha Yojana
description: ₹2,000 fixed deposit for girl children born in BPL families to reduce female feticide and improve sex ratio.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme - Bihar
description: Monthly pension to widows aged 40–79 from BPL families in Bihar for social and financial security.

name: Mukhyamantri Balika (Snatak) Protsahan Yojana
description: ₹25,000 incentive for girls graduating from recognized universities in Bihar to promote higher education.

name: Chief Minister Kanya Utthan Yojana
description: Financial assistance for development and empowerment of girl children in Bihar with birth certificate requirement.
